document_data.name: Garren Hammerhand
document_data.mainbody:
'''Garren Hammerhand''' was a [[shield dwarf]] man of [[Clan Hammerhand]], based in [[Ravens Bluff]] in the [[Vast]] in [[north Faer没n]].

Garren Hammerhand was leader of Clan Hammerhand, which hired itself out as mercenaries in the 1360s DR.
